# Problem 1

## Read and clean Mr. Trash Wheel

The following code imports the Mr. Trash Wheel data and cleans the data.

```{r}
trash_wheel = 
  readxl::read_excel("./problem_1/trash_wheel_collection.xlsx", 
                     sheet = "Mr. Trash Wheel",
                     range = "A2:N408",
                     na = "") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  drop_na(dumpster) %>% 
  mutate(sports_balls_int = 
           (round(sports_balls) %>% 
           as.integer()))
```
